name: com.maksymhernets.autotranslateforunitylocalization
description:
Auto translation plugin allows you to translate a project in just one click, thanks to other automation systems, such as lo—Åalization system unity and google cloud translator.

    
 
    Use 'Window/Auto Localization/Find Text for Tables in Scene'
    Use 'Window/Auto localization/Auto Translate for Tables'
